item.title: What Ozone
item.description: What is Ozone and how does it work? Ozone provides advertisers, publishers and their programmatic partners with a range of services for advertisers to reach audiences and for publishers to monetise their content and audience from advertising. Described here is a high-level overview of the programmatic ecosystem and Ozone’s role. Programmatic Advertising - The Helicoptor View At it’s most simple level programmatic advertising involves publishers and advertisers interacting with AdTech companies (we’ll call them Ad Partners) that are a middlemen or brokers in the process of buying and selling advertising inventory and reaching audiences.
